questions.text: Who tipped Alex and Supergirl off to the dead alien found in the opening of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Maggie Sawyer.

	The dead alien was found by a homeless man. The body was in the trunk of a car parked on the docks.

questions.text: J'onn J'onnz met another martian at the bar.
questions.explanation:
True.

	He met her at the end of the previous episode, but went back to the bar to have a full conversation with her early in this episode. Her name was M'gann M'orzz

questions.text: Who was teaching Mon-El the English language?
questions.explanation:
Winn.

	Mon called Kara's mother a "babe" when he first saw the hologram of her. He thought it simply meant beautiful woman. She told him not to let Winn teach him everything about the English language.

questions.text: Who was known as the Maid of Might?
questions.explanation:
Supergirl.

	When she burst into the fight club the announcer called her by that name. Supergirl was paired against a powerful alien who won the fight quickly by nearly knocking her out.

questions.text: Who did J'onn tell they couldn't leave the DEO building?
questions.explanation:
Mon-El.

	The official reason was they needed to know the extent of his powers before he was allowed out, unofficially J'onn didn't trust him. Mon-El convinced Winn to sneak him out of the building.

questions.text: What holiday was being celebrated during the episode?
questions.explanation:
Halloween.

	The original U.S. air date of the episode was Oct. 31, 2016. Winn and Mon-El attended a Halloween party at a bar after they snuck out of the DEO. Neither wore a costume though.

questions.text: Who ran the alien fight club?
questions.explanation:
Roulette.

	Roulette had a snake tattooed across her shoulders and back. She claimed her club wasn't illegal because aliens technically weren't people and didn't have any legal rights.

questions.text: Megan Morse was introduced as Miss Martian when Alex and Maggie first met her.
questions.explanation:
True.

	They saw her while investigating the underground alien fight club. Megan was the Earth name for M'Gann. She was played Sharon Leal.

questions.text: Who helped the fight club people capture Hank?
questions.explanation:
M'gann.

	Hank went to talk to her again after they fought over her participation in the fight club. She talked to him briefly until he was attacked from behind by Roulette's agents. M'gann then told her that she was sorry, and he shouldn't have come back.

questions.text: Who did Kara get to be an on the record source for her story?
questions.explanation:
Supergirl.

	She struggled to find a source for stories that she was involved with, and finally decided to quote herself. Of course Snapper Carr didn't know they are the same person. He still was upset with the story, and instead complained about it not being written in AP style.
